text: Sergej Barbarez (born 17 September 1971) is a former Bosnia and Herzegovina football player. He has played for Bosnia and Herzegovina national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Hannover 96 1992–93 2.
